items.doc:
Move and resize the focused window.

Parameters:
 * option - A string specifying the option, valid strings are: `halfleft`, `halfright`, `halfup`, `halfdown`, `cornerNW`, `cornerSW`, `cornerNE`, `cornerSE`, `center`, `fullscreen`, `expand`, `shrink`.
items.desc: Move and resize the focused window.
stripped_doc: Move and resize the focused window.

items.doc:
Move the focused window between all of the screens in the `direction`.

Parameters:
 * direction - A string specifying the direction, valid strings are: `left`, `right`, `up`, `down`, `next`.
items.desc: Move the focused window between all of the screens in the `direction`.
stripped_doc: Move the focused window between all of the screens in the `direction`.
items.name: moveToScreen
parameters: * direction - A string specifying the direction, valid strings are: `left`, `right`, `up`, `down`, `next`.

items.doc:
Move the focused window in the `direction` by on step. The step scale equals to the width/height of one gridpart.

Parameters:
 * direction - A string specifying the direction, valid strings are: `left`, `right`, `up`, `down`.
items.desc: Move the focused window in the `direction` by on step. The step scale equals to the width/height of one gridpart.

items.name: stepResize
